body:
Comment 4: 
Dave just reported what turns out to be the same phenomenon in the attached code.
inspection with 6g -NS  shows that the named one has an extra 

     13 0008 (namedr.go:9) MOVL    $0,a+8(FP)
     14 0009 (namedr.go:9) NOP     a+8(FP),

which without -N becomes a spurious
      11 0006 (namedr.go:9) MOVL    $0,AX

this also happens in the inlined code.
Attachments: 1. namedr.go (381 bytes)
